alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 11:28PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Marion, southeastern Lawrence, northwestern Covington and Jefferson Davis Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1127 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Clem to near Jayess. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clem around 1130 PM CST. Lone Star around 1135 PM CST. Mount Olive and Oak Vale around 1145 PM CST. Morgantown around 1150 PM CST. Goss and Society Hill around 1155 PM CST. Bunker Hill around 1200 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Bassfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
